title: Pixel stand won't show bubble tips when docked, only shows a grey Google assistant button
content:
Google stand was working fine. I had to reset my phone to factory settings because it was getting to slow. I did it and after that when I place my pixel 3xl on the pixel stand it won't show the tips bubbles with recommend Google assistant commands. Instead it only shows a grey scale Google assistant icon and the label stating that it is fast charging. Any idea on how to get the bubble tips back? 

I tried to forget the Google stand and configure it again and didn't work. 

Thabks
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3 XL
